gamerule.shiftingWares.allowMapReroll.de: Buying a map from a cartographer allows them to generate a new one.
gamerule.shiftingWares.dailyReroll.descr: Villagers will reroll all their offers once per day.
gamerule.shiftingWares.depleteReroll.des: Villagers will never refill their offers. Instead, those are rerolled after being completely depleted.
